CustomField.description: This field will represent the related loan payment transaction. New LPT will point to Old LPT and vice versa during out of order reversal.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will represent the related loan payment transaction. New LPT will point to Old LPT and vice versa during out of order reversal.
CustomField.label: Out of Order Payment
CustomField.relationshipLabel: Loan Payment Transactions (Out of Order Payment)
